DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine correct dose Vitamin D give prevent HIV related complication .
DOC.criteria: Ages 825 Documented HIV1 infection On stable ART > 3 month Cumulative ART least 6 month 25 ( OH ) D level < 30 ng/ml screen > 400 IU daily regular vitamin D intake Parathyroid/calcium disorder Active malignancy Pregnancy/intent become pregnant/breastfeeding Chronic infectious/inflammatory condition Creatinine clearance < 50 ml/min Hemoglobin < 9.0 g/dL AST ALT > 2.5 ULN Diabetes require hypoglycemic agent Known coronary artery disease Inability swallow pill
